usage: Light to moderate strength training, toning, aerobics, rehabilitation exercises, and home or gym workouts.
key_features: Includes 1.5 kg pack of 2 dumbbells in pink color
Neoprene coating with smooth, anti-slip finish for comfortable and secure grip
Hexagonal design to prevent rolling and allow stable placement
Suitable for strength training, toning, aerobics, rehabilitation, and home workouts
Durable construction resistant to wear and tear
Easy to wipe clean after use
Compact, stylish design with vibrant pink color and printed weight marking
ai_description: A pair of compact pink hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth neoprene-like coating rest on light surfaces and wooden floors in home and studio settings. The ends clearly show the KAKSS logo and 1.5 KG marking in white, highlighting their light weight and clean, modern look.
target_audience: Home fitness users, beginners to intermediate exercisers, people doing light strength training, toning, or rehab, and those wanting compact dumbbells for home or studio workouts.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells Sets for Gym Exercise (Proudly Made in India) (1.5 kg Pack of 2, Pink)
